@Phantom_generator_2D/ellipseMatrix.m

00001 % ======================================================================
00002 %> @brief  Set the elements of the Matrix Image which are in the interior of the
00003 %> ellipse E with the value 'color'. The ellipse E has center (y0, x0), the
00004 %> major axe = a, the minor axe = b, and teta is the angle macked by the
00005 %> major axe with the orizontal axe.
00006 %>
00007 %> @param y0 center of ellipse - y coordinate
00008 %> @param x0 center of ellipse - x coordinate
00009 %> @param a major axe
00010 %> @param b minor axe
00011 %> @param teta angle
00012 %> @param Image image
00013 %> @param color
00014 %>
00015 %> @retval ret elipse object
00016 % =====================================================================
00017 function ret = ellipseMatrix(phobj,y0, x0, a, b, teta, Image, color)
00018 
00019 if a==0 & b==0
00020     ret = Image;
00021     return;
00022 end
00023 
00024 
00025 im = Image;
00026 [ny, nx] = size(im);
00027 imtemp = zeros(ny, nx);
00028 list = zeros(ny * nx, 2);
00029 toplist = 1;
00030 c = sqrt(a * a - b * b);
00031 
00032 %x0 = round(x0);
00033 %y0 = round(y0);
00034 list(toplist, 1) = round(y0);
00035 list(toplist, 2) = round(x0);
00036 im(round(y0), round(x0)) = im(round(y0), round(x0))+color;
00037 imtemp(round(y0), round(x0)) = imtemp(round(y0), round(x0))+color;
00038 
00039 while (toplist > 0)
00040     y = list(toplist, 1);
00041     x = list(toplist, 2);
00042     toplist = toplist - 1;
00043     
00044     if local_isValid(y, x + 1, y0, x0, a, c, teta, imtemp, ny, nx, color)
00045         toplist = toplist + 1;
00046         list(toplist, 1) = y;
00047         list(toplist, 2) = x + 1;
00048         im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;
00049         imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;        
00050     end
00051     if local_isValid(y - 1, x, y0, x0, a, c, teta, imtemp, ny, nx, color)
00052         toplist = toplist + 1;
00053         list(toplist, 1) = y - 1;
00054         list(toplist, 2) = x;
00055         im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;
00056         imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;        
00057     end
00058     if local_isValid(y, x - 1, y0, x0, a, c, teta, imtemp, ny, nx, color)
00059         toplist = toplist + 1;
00060         list(toplist, 1) = y;
00061         list(toplist, 2) = x - 1;
00062         im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;
00063         imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;        
00064     end
00065     if local_isValid(y + 1, x, y0, x0, a, c, teta, imtemp, ny, nx, color) == 1
00066         toplist = toplist + 1;
00067         list(toplist, 1) = y + 1;
00068         list(toplist, 2) = x;
00069         im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = im(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;
00070         imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2)) = imtemp(list(toplist, 1), list(toplist, 2))+color;        
00071     end
00072 end
00073 ret = im;
00074 
00075 
00076 %--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 function is_val = local_isValid(y, x, y0, x0, a, c, teta, im, ny, nx, color)
00078 
00079 %     y=y-0.5; x=x-0.5;
00080 %     y0=y0-0.5; x0=x0-0.5;
00081     d1 = (x - x0 - c * cos(teta))^2 + (y - y0 - c * sin(teta))^2;
00082     d1 = sqrt(d1);
00083     d2 = (x - x0 + c * cos(teta))^2 + (y - y0 + c * sin(teta))^2;
00084     d2 = sqrt(d2);
00085     if (x>0) && (y>0) && (x <= nx) && (y <= ny) &&  ...
00086             (d1 + d2 <= 2*a) && (im(round(y), round(x)) ~= color)
00087         is_val = 1;
00088     else
00089         is_val = 0;
00090     end
